text: Mohammad Azharuddin is a politician who was a cricketer before he became a poltician. He was the captain of the Indian cricket team in the 1990's. == Early life and education == Azharuddin was born in Hyderabad. He completed his undergraduate studies and earned a degree in commerce from Nizam College, Osmania University. ==References== Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Indian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Hyderabad, India
title: Mohammad Azharuddin
